content: of the body ig demiwool tails use yellow yarn r1 magic_ring 5sc 5 r2 5inc 10 r3 10sc 10 fasten_off cut the yarn and leave a long tail for sewing sew the tail at the bottom back of the body tip flatten the tail horizontally when sewing ig demiwool ig demiwool hat start with pink yarn r1 magic_ring 6sc 6 r2 6 increase 12 r3 1sc increase x 6 18 r4 1sc increase 1sc x 6 24 r5 3sc increase x 6 30 r6 2sc increase 2sc x 6 36 r7 change to blue yarn 36sc 36 r8 9 change to pink yarn 2 rounds 36sc 36 r10 change to blue yarn 5sc increase x 6 42 r11 14 change to pink yarn 4 rounds 42sc 42 fasten_off cut the yarn and weave in the end ig demiwool happy stitching ig demiwool
